about_the_game:
CORE DEFENCE

Core Defence is a tower defence game with roguelike elements. In each run, your goal is to defend the Core for as long as you can by placing towers that will constantly attack incoming monsters, as well as carefully choosing powerful effects. In between runs, you will be able to spend all the crystals that you've gathered to unlock new towers and purchase various upgrades.

BUY TOWERS TO KILL MONSTERS

Each run, your objective is simple: defend the Core from monsters for as long as you can. Do that by building a variety of towers. These come with distinct damage types, stats, utilities, and unique effects. Choose wisely to create a deadly defence against the oncoming monsters, as well as bosses. Defeating them yields valuable chests filled with crystals and trophies that make you even more powerful.

EFFECTS

Throughout each run, you'll be choosing from a variety of powerful effects. These span a wide spectrum, ranging from straightforward damage boosts to transformative alterations in your towers' functionality. Your wise selections will be crucial in amplifing your towers' might.

CRYSTALS AND UPGRADES

During each run you'll be collecting crystals dropped by defeated enemies. These precious resources can be invested in acquiring new towers and upgrading them, enchancing your power for the next battle.
